column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Thursday March 25 at 4:00 p.m.

column4: The roadway is shutdown in both directions between Cooper Dr and Virginia Ave due to a Police incident.
Inbound traffic diverted to either Cooper Dr or Waller Ave.  Police are directing traffic as needed.
Outbound traffic diverted to either Virginia Ave or Huguelet Dr.
Motorists should avoid the general area if possible.
